newsitem.title: KENYA: Kenya shilling unchanged against the dollar.
newsitem.headline: Kenya shilling unchanged against the dollar.

text.p: Kenya's shilling was unchanged against the dollar on Monday in low market activity, dealers said.
The Central Bank of Kenya posted a shilling mean rate of 56.50 against the dollar, unchanged from Friday. Against the pound, the shilling was posted at an average of 88.21 from 88.56 on Friday.
"The 56.35/65 levels should hold out in the short-term, with a significant resistance point expected at the 56.00 level," said a dealer.
